title: Can site-specific nutrient management improve the productivity and resource use efficiency of climate-resilient finger millet in calcareous soils in India?
content:
Publication date: 30 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 12

Author(s): Biswajit Pramanick, Sanju Choudhary, Mukesh Kumar, Santosh Kumar Singh, R.K. Jha, Satish Kumar Singh, Saleh H. Salmen, Mohammad Javed Ansari, Akbar Hossain
